GSD.product_version: versions from v4.18 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
lib: overflow: Do not define 64-bit tests on 32-bit

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit f919fb3d3cf1136e464bf2c649fe820148f33666, it was introduced in version v4.18 by commit 455a35a6cdb6f53fe9294e23301eb056f2908bd9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: lib: overflow: Do not define 64-bit tests on 32-bit
